name: lets go deep(works now)(play in browser dose not work very well )
name_original: lets go deep(works now)(play in browser dose not work very well )
description: In 'Let's Go Deep' your aim is to colonise the ocean, through three different buildings - the drill (which gives you materials), storage (for keeping materials in) and a trading post (which converts materials into money).  With money, you can buy more buildings . There are three types of randomly generated tile: plain, iron and hills. You can't build on hills and you get boosts for building on iron,
